name: Hercules
text: Atonement — Response: After a [[labor]] card is added to the victory display, put las card of the [[gift]] deck into play. Ready Hercules. You may flip to alter-ego form. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Hercules
text: Hercules begins the game with a [[labor]] deck y a [[gift]] deck. (See insert.) New Labors of Hercules — Acción: si there is no [[labor]] card in play, reveal las card of the [[labor]] deck.

name: Defeat the Hydra
text: Victory 0. Attached Esbirro recibe +6 de Vida y gana the [[Élite]] trait. Attached Esbirro cannot take de Daño except from Hercules's ataca. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Find a non-[[Élite]] Esbirro with at least 6 printed de Vida. Reveal it, heal all de Daño from it, y attach this card to it.

name: Embody Pathos
text: Victory 0. Attached side scheme gana assault. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme except by Hercules's thwarts. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Find an encounter side scheme that is not in play y reveal it, treating each [per_hero] on it as 1, y attach this card to it. Place 6 additional de Amenaza on it.

name: Protect Humanity
text: Uses (3 labor counters). Victory 0. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Find Amadeus Cho y put him into play. Interrupción obligada: cuando the villain would attack Hercules, choose 1 of a tu Aliados. The villain ataca that ally instead. After that attack resolves, if Hercules defended, quita 1 labor counter from here.

name: Nemean Lion Skin
text: Permanent. Hercules recibe +2 de Vida y gana Tesón. Response: After this card enters play, draw 4 cards.

name: Shield of Perseus
text: Permanent. Hercules recibe +1 hit point y gana retaliate 1. Response: After this card enters play, draw 4 cards.

name: Sword of Peleus
text: Permanent. Restricted. Hercules recibe +1 hit point y his basic ataca ganan Penetrante. Response: After this card enters play, draw 4 cards.

name: Amadeus Cho
text: Interrupción obligada: cuando a Esbirro would attack you, it ataca Amadeus Cho instead. Acción: Exhaust Amadeus Cho → draw 1 card.

flavor: "As Hercules has said countless times: have at thee!" —Hercules
name: The Gift of Battle
text: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each [[Gift]] card you control. Acción de Héroe (attack): inflige 5 de Daño to an enemy.

name: Son of Zeus
text: Acción de Héroe: Ready Hercules. si you control at least: • 1 [[Gift]] card, ready an identity-specific upgrade you control. • 2 [[Gift]] cards, ganan una carta de Estado "Duro". • 3 [[Gift]] cards, draw 1 card.

flavor: "Zounds! Is that you, oh sister of mine?" —Hercules
name: Wisdom of Athena
text: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each [[Gift]] card you control. Acción de Héroe (thwart): Remove 4 de Amenaza from a scheme.

flavor: Although Olympus's influence may have waned since the Hellenistic period, the celebrating has not.
name: Olympus
text: Resource: Exhaust Olympus → generate a [wild] resource for each [[Gift]] card you control.

name: Gauntlets of Hercules
text: Interrupción de Héroe: cuando Hercules defends against an attack, exhaust Gauntlets of Hercules → Hercules gana retaliate 1 for that attack for each [[Gift]] card you control.

name: Golden Mace
text: Restricted. Interrupción de Héroe: cuando Hercules makes a basic attack, exhaust Golden Mace → Hercules recibe +1 ATQ para este ataque for each [[Gift]] card you control. This attack gana Brutalidad.

name: Herc's Helm
text: Interrupción de Héroe (defense): cuando the villain ataca, exhaust Herc's Helm → reduce the amount of de Daño este ataque deals by 1.

flavor: Like the mighty lions native to ancient Greece, the ferocity of Hercules is incredible.
name: Lion of Olympus
text: Temporary. (Descarta esta carta at the end of the round.) Your hero recibe +1 THW, +1 ATQ, y +1 DEF.

name: Prince of Power
text: Respuesta de Héroe: After Hercules ataca y defeats an enemy, exhaust Prince of Power → heal 1 de Daño from Hercules for each point of excess de Daño dealt to that enemy by that attack.

name: Deathcry
text: [star] Interrupción de Héroe: cuando Deathcry makes a basic attack, inflige a tu hero 1 de Daño → Deathcry takes -1 consequential de Daño ([cost]) para este ataque.

flavor: "I've heard she can beat Captain Marvel in an arm wrestling contest." —Gorilla-Man
name: Namora
text: [star] Namora recibe +1 hit point for each other ally you control.

name: Thor
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: After Thor makes a basic thwart, discard cards desde el top of the encounter deck until you discard a Esbirro. Put that Esbirro into play engaged with you.

name: Recruitment Drive
text: Alter ego only. Acción: Discard Recruitment Drive y choose a jugador → reduce the resource cost of the next ally that jugador plays this phase to 0.

name: "Avenge Me!"
text: Play only if a tu identity has the [[Vengador]] trait. Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally. Interrupción: cuando attached ally is defeated, draw 2 cards.

flavor: Having lived for around a million years, even Gilgamesh had once forgotten who he was.
name: Gilgamesh
text: As an additional cost to play this card, if you do not have the [[Eternal]] trait, confuse a tu identity.

name: Ancient Rivalry
text: Team-Up (Hercules y Thor). Max 1 per deck. Acción de Héroe: Search a tu discard pile for an identity-specific upgrade y add it a tu hand. Ready Hercules y Thor.

flavor: "What, you think this fight is almost over?! That was just warm-up practice." —Thor

name: Evaluate Threat
text: Victory 0. Play only if a tu identity has the [[Vengador]] o [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait. Cuando se derrote esta carta: cada jugador may search their deck y discard pile for an [[Vengador]] o [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] card y add it to their hand. (Shuffle.) Reduce the cost to play each of those cards by 2 until the end of the phase.
